attributes.action: Sack Mr Gove for supporting the re-instatement of Geoffrey Bettley, a teacher who is on the sex offender's register for viewing child pornography
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Gove has supported the re-instatement  of Geoffrey Bettley, a teacher who is on the sex offender register for viewing child pornography.
Like most parents, I would never send my children to school if I knew someone on the sex-offender register was going to teach them.
Mr Gove has demonstrated an appalling lack of understanding of the risks involved and of public opinion in this matter.  I call upon Mr Cameron to sack Mr Gove, who I consider unfit for his post.
